Profile: Shareable CodeSystem

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/ex-diagnosisrelatedgroup defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
100 Normal Vaginal DeliveryNormal Vaginal Delivery.
101 Appendectomy - uncomplicatedAppendectomy without rupture or other complications.
300 Tooth abscessEmergency department treatment of a tooth abscess.
400 Head trauma - concussionHead trauma - concussion.
